column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I'm terribly sorry to hear that we didn't serve you a perfect drink. That's really disappointing. If you ever have a poor experience we want to know. Thank you for bringing it to our attention. Next time please let us know while you're still here. I know our staff would love to make it perfect before you leave. You seem like someone who likes to be heard. Well
column2: we're listening. You just have to let us know.
